languages.text: {n}Абеляр слегка опешивает от неожиданного вопроса.{/n} "Клинок? Честно говоря, с трудом припоминаю... знаете, в обычной ситуации я бы посоветовал обратиться к Морту — он был главным специалистом по трофеям. Но поскольку господин архмилитант уже покинул нас, я бы посоветовал вам спросить Высокого фактотума. Если на палубе после побоища оставалось что-то хоть немного ценное, оно наверняка оказалось в его руках".

traits.locale_text: {n}Абеляр слегка опешивает от неожиданного вопроса.{/n} "Клинок? Честно говоря, с трудом припоминаю... знаете, в обычной ситуации я бы посоветовал обратиться к Морту — он был главным специалистом по трофею. Но поскольку господин архимилитант уже покинул нас, я бы посоветовал вам спросить Высокого Фактотума. Если на палубе после побоища оставалось что-то хоть немного ценное, оно наверняка оказалось в его руках".

languages.text: {n}Abelard is slightly taken aback by the unexpected question.{/n} "His sword? To be honest, I'm struggling to remember... Under ordinary circumstances, I would direct you to Mort, as he was our expert on battle trophies. But as the Arch-Militant has now left us, I suggest you speak to the High Factotum. If there was anything even slightly valuable left on deck after the bloodshed, it almost certainly found its way into his hands."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр слегка опешивает от неожиданного вопроса.{/n} "Клинок? Честно говоря, с трудом припоминаю... знаете, в обычной ситуации я бы посоветовал обратиться к Морту — он был главным специалистом по трофеям. Но поскольку господин архмилитант уже покинул нас, я бы посоветовал вам спросить Высокого фактотума. Если на палубе после побоища оставалось что-то хоть немного ценное, оно наверняка оказалось в его руках".

Under ordinary circumstances, I would direct you to Mort, as he was our expert on battle trophies. But as the Arch-Militant has now left us, I suggest you speak to the High Factotum. If there was anything even slightly valuable left on deck after the bloodshed, it almost certainly found its way into his hands."

languages.text: {n}这个突如其来的问题，让阿贝拉德略微有些吃惊。{/n}“他的剑？老实说，我恐怕有点记不住了……如果是通常情况下，我会建议您去问问莫特，因为他是管理战利品的专家。不过，既然我们的首席战士已经不在了，我建议你去问问高阶顾问。那场恶战过后，只要战场上哪怕有一丁点稍微有点价值的东西，估计多半都会落入他的手中。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard is slightly taken aback by the unexpected question.{/n} "His sword? To be honest, I'm struggling to remember... Under ordinary circumstances, I would direct you to Mort, as he was our expert on battle trophies. But as the Arch-Militant has now left us, I suggest you speak to the High Factotum. If there was anything even slightly valuable left on deck after the bloodshed, it almost certainly found its way into his hands."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个突如其来的问题，让阿贝拉德略微有些吃惊。{/n}“他的剑？老实说，我恐怕有点记不住了……如果是通常情况下，我会建议您去问问莫特，因为他是管理战利品的专家。不过，既然我们的首席战士已经不在了，我建议你去问问高阶顾问。那场恶战过后，只要战场上哪怕有一丁点稍微有点价值的东西，估计多半都会落入他的手中。”

languages.text: {n}A Abelard le sorprende la pregunta.{/n} «¿Su espada? A decir verdad, me cuesta recordarla... En circunstancias normales le remitiría a Mort, nuestro experto en trofeos de guerra. Pero, dado que el Archimilitante nos ha dejado, le sugeriría recurrir al Sumo Factótum. Si quedó cualquier cosa que tuviera el más mínimo valor en cubierta tras la masacre, seguramente acabó en sus manos».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard is slightly taken aback by the unexpected question.{/n} "His sword? To be honest, I'm struggling to remember... Under ordinary circumstances, I would direct you to Mort, as he was our expert on battle trophies. But as the Arch-Militant has now left us, I suggest you speak to the High Factotum. If there was anything even slightly valuable left on deck after the bloodshed, it almost certainly found its way into his hands."

traits.locale_text: {n}A Abelard le sorprende la pregunta.{/n} «¿Su espada? A decir verdad, me cuesta recordarla... En circunstancias normales le remitiría a Mort, nuestro experto en trofeos de guerra. Pero, dado que el Archimilitante nos ha dejado, le sugeriría recurrir al Sumo Factótum. Si quedó cualquier cosa que tuviera el más mínimo valor en cubierta tras la masacre, seguramente acabó en sus manos».

languages.text: {n}アベラードは思いがけない質問に少し驚いた。{/n}「彼の剣？正直なところ、思い出せません…通常であれば、戦利品の専門家であったモートを紹介するところです。ただ、アーク・ミリタントはもういませんので、ハイ・ファクトタムに話を聞くことをおすすめします。流血の後、甲板上に少しでも貴重なものが残っていれば、ほぼ間違いなく彼の手に渡ることでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard is slightly taken aback by the unexpected question.{/n} "His sword? To be honest, I'm struggling to remember... Under ordinary circumstances, I would direct you to Mort, as he was our expert on battle trophies. But as the Arch-Militant has now left us, I suggest you speak to the High Factotum. If there was anything even slightly valuable left on deck after the bloodshed, it almost certainly found its way into his hands."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラードは思いがけない質問に少し驚いた。{/n}「彼の剣？正直なところ、思い出せません…通常であれば、戦利品の専門家であったモートを紹介するところです。ただ、アーク・ミリタントはもういませんので、ハイ・ファクトタムに話を聞くことをおすすめします。流血の後、甲板上に少しでも貴重なものが残っていれば、ほぼ間違いなく彼の手に渡ることでしょう」

languages.text: {n}Abelard wird von der unerwarteten Frage etwas überrumpelt.{/n} "Sein Schwert? Ehrlich gesagt erinnere ich mich nicht recht ... Unter gewöhnlichen Umständen würde ich Euch an Mort verweisen, er war unser Experte für Kampftrophäen. Aber da der Erzmilitant uns verlassen hat, schlage ich vor, dass Ihr mit dem Hoch-Faktotum sprecht. Wenn nach dem Blutvergießen etwas von irgendeinem Wert zurückgeblieben ist, hat es ganz gewiss seinen Weg in dessen Hände gefunden."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard is slightly taken aback by the unexpected question.{/n} "His sword? To be honest, I'm struggling to remember... Under ordinary circumstances, I would direct you to Mort, as he was our expert on battle trophies. But as the Arch-Militant has now left us, I suggest you speak to the High Factotum. If there was anything even slightly valuable left on deck after the bloodshed, it almost certainly found its way into his hands."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard wird von der unerwarteten Frage etwas überrumpelt.{/n} "Sein Schwert? Ehrlich gesagt erinnere ich mich nicht recht ... Unter gewöhnlichen Umständen würde ich Euch an Mort verweisen, er war unser Experte für Kampftrophäen. Aber da der Erzmilitant uns verlassen hat, schlage ich vor, dass Ihr mit dem Hoch-Faktotum sprecht. Wenn nach dem Blutvergießen etwas von irgendeinem Wert zurückgeblieben ist, hat es ganz gewiss seinen Weg in dessen Hände gefunden."

languages.text: {n}Abélard est légèrement pris de court par cette question inattendue.{/n} « Son épée ? Pour être franc, je ne suis pas certain de m'en souvenir... En temps normal, je vous aurais {mf|orienté|orientée} vers Mort, qui était notre spécialiste des prises de guerre. Mais comme l'archimilitant nous a quittés, je vous suggère de vous adresser au haut factotum. S'il est resté le moindre objet avec un tant soit peu de valeur après le bain de sang sur le pont, nul doute qu'il a atterri entre ses mains. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard is slightly taken aback by the unexpected question.{/n} "His sword? To be honest, I'm struggling to remember... Under ordinary circumstances, I would direct you to Mort, as he was our expert on battle trophies. But as the Arch-Militant has now left us, I suggest you speak to the High Factotum. If there was anything even slightly valuable left on deck after the bloodshed, it almost certainly found its way into his hands."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard est légèrement pris de court par cette question inattendue.{/n} « Son épée ? Pour être franc, je ne suis pas certain de m'en souvenir... En temps normal, je vous aurais {mf|orienté|orientée} vers Mort, qui était notre spécialiste des prises de guerre. Mais comme l'archimilitant nous a quittés, je vous suggère de vous adresser au haut factotum. S'il est resté le moindre objet avec un tant soit peu de valeur après le bain de sang sur le pont, nul doute qu'il a atterri entre ses mains. »

languages.text: {n}Abelard, bu beklenmedik soru karşısında biraz şaşırıyor.{/n} "Kılıcı mı? Açıkçası pek hatırlayamıyorum. Normal koşullarda sizi Mort'a yönlendirirdim. Savaş ganimetleri konusunda uzmanımız oydu ama Başmilitan artık aramızda olmadığına göre Arşıkâhya ile konuşmanızı öneririm. Güvertedeki katliamdan geriye asgari değerde bile bir şey kaldıysa kuvvetle muhtemel kendisinin eline geçmiştir."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard is slightly taken aback by the unexpected question.{/n} "His sword? To be honest, I'm struggling to remember... Under ordinary circumstances, I would direct you to Mort, as he was our expert on battle trophies. But as the Arch-Militant has now left us, I suggest you speak to the High Factotum. If there was anything even slightly valuable left on deck after the bloodshed, it almost certainly found its way into his hands."

Savaş ganimetleri konusunda uzmanımız oydu ama Başmilitan artık aramızda olmadığına göre Arşıkâhya ile konuşmanızı öneririm. Güvertedeki katliamdan geriye asgari değerde bile bir şey kaldıysa kuvvetle muhtemel kendisinin eline geçmiştir."
